context_of_use: This use case allows users to update and maintain their personal profile information within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: to maintain accurate account details
description: Enable users to update and maintain their personal profile information.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User is logged into the system.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated successfully.
assumptions: User has valid login credentials to access the system.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
main_flow: 1. User requests to update profile information → System displays the profile update form.
2. User enters new profile information → System validates the input.
3. User submits the updated profile information → System updates the user's profile.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): If the input is valid but incomplete, then the system highlights the missing fields and prompts the user to complete them.
AF-2 (from Step 3): If the update is successful, then the system displays a confirmation message to the user.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the input is invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts the user to correct the input.
